abstract: Defends German occupation of Norway and Denmark and comments on Brit war aims, May Day s, Bklyn
snippet: Dr. Hans Borchers, German Consul General, speaking last night at a celebration of German National Labor Day at the Schwaben Hall, 474 Knickerbocker Avenue, Brooklyn, defended the German occupation of Norway and Denmark and ......

headline.main: BORCHERS DEFENDS NAZIS' NEW ACTION; Consul General Upholds the Occupation of Norway and Denmark at May Day Fete SAYS BRITISH ARE EXPOSED Tells Countrymen That Fight Is No Longer Against Hitler Only, but Entire Nation

lead_paragraph: Dr. Hans Borchers, German Consul General, speaking last night at a celebration of German National Labor Day at the Schwaben Hall, 474 Knickerbocker Avenue, Brooklyn, defended the German occupation of Norway and Denmark and ...
